original_text: And it shall be a perpetual statute unto them, that he that sprinkleth the water of separation shall wash his clothes; and he that toucheth the water of separation shall be unclean until even.
korean_text: 이는 그들의 영구한 율례니라 정결하게 하는 물을 뿌린 자는 자기의 옷을 빨 것이며 정결하게 하는 물을 만지는 자는 저녁까지 부정할 것이며

sentences.original_text: And it shall be a perpetual statute unto them
that he that sprinkleth the water of separation
and he that toucheth the water of separation
